channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
Ok, How do i put a npc in certain spot and make it say what i want it to say?
I want to put dharok at home by a wall and make him say "Owner Tylerocks1 is online or offline" but i also want him to say "Owner Piru is online or offline" and so on with co owners
anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2008, 09:33:43 PM[/size][hr]help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 08:10:14 AM[/size][hr]any?
